item.description:
Beach Party ~ active SINGLES in their 30's - 50's!
Miami Beach Association ~ Old Lyme, CT
Private Residence (Gated Community)
~~~~~~~~~~~~
We are asking everyone to bring enough food or drink for 4 to 6 people...
There may be a request for a small contribution to offset some of the expenses...
Please... no children or pets.
~~~~~~~~~~~~
I have two grills, fire pit, and volleyball...
It is two blocks to our private beach...
The beach is between Sound View and Hawk's Nest Beach...
There may be fireworks on the beach... TBD
~~~~~~~~
Please RSVP to my email...
Lynne Galipeau ~ lynnegalipeau@yahoo.com ~ my cell at (860)558-2046 or (860)434-7077 ~
~~~~~~~~
Directions:
Rte 9 South to end,
go Left on Rte 95North
- immediately over CT River, take first exit (#70 - Rte 156, Rte 1, Old Lyme).
Right off exit, go 4 miles down Rte 156 to
South Shore Landing (commercial business) on Left - plenty of parking.
#14 Miami Avenue is 4/10m further down on the right (gate will be up), 3rd house on Left (grey ranch).
NOTE: You may wish to drop off your "stuff" at the party, then park and walk back to the house.
~~~~~~~~
>>> Please RSVP to Lynne G. directly, indicating what you will be bringing. Remember, this is a private residnece, so she'll have to limit the number of attendees, as such, I suggest you RSVP ASAP! At last year's Memorial Day party, there were a few dozen participants.

>>> Please post your RSVP on MeetUp and indicate if you need or are offering a ride to Car-poolers, but BE CERTAIN to RSVP DIRECTLY to Lynne, NOT Rob P. If you cancel, please inform Lynn directly, NOT Rob P.

Lynne originally sent me this invitation via our "Single Event" connection, but has graciously allowed me to post it on my MeetUp site. Again, this party is intended for active SINGLES in their 30's - 50's!

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: SINGLES BEACH PARTY - Old LYME Private residence
